transcription.description: The markdown-formatted transcribed text extracted from the image. Set to null if no transcribable text is found. Ensure **all** visible text and formatting elements (tables, headers, footers, page numbers) are transcribed to well-structured markdown.

no_transcribable_text.description: True if the image contains no transcribable text; otherwise, false.

transcription_not_possible.description: True if transcription is not possible due to issues such as poor image quality or illegibility; otherwise, false.
